00049 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const char * szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00050 {
00051         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00052         if(bCaseSensitive)
00053         {
00054                 while(*szKey)
00055                 {
00056                         uResult += (unsigned char)(*(szKey));
00057                         szKey++;
00058                 }
00059         } else {
00060                 while(*szKey)
00061                 {
00062                         uResult += (unsigned char)tolower(*(szKey));
00063                         szKey++;
00064                 }
00065         }
00066         return uResult;
00067 }
00068 
00072 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const char * szKey1,const char * szKey2,bool bCaseSensitive)
00073 {
00074         if(bCaseSensitive)
00075         {
00076                 while(*szKey1 && *szKey2)
00077                 {
00078                         if(*szKey1 != *szKey2)
00079                                 return false;
00080                         szKey1++;
00081                         szKey2++;
00082                 }
00083         } else {
00084                 while(*szKey1 && *szKey2)
00085                 {
00086                         if(tolower(*szKey1) != tolower(*szKey2))
00087                                 return false;
00088                         szKey1++;
00089                         szKey2++;
00090                 }
00091         }
00092         //check if one of the strings is a substring of the other (like "perl" and "perlcore")
00093         if(*szKey1 || *szKey2)
00094                 return false;
00095         return true;
00096 }
00097 
00101 inline void kvi_hash_key_copy(const char * const &szFrom,const char * &szTo,bool bDeepCopy)
00102 {
00103         if(bDeepCopy)
00104         {
00105                 int len = kvi_strLen(szFrom);
00106                 char * dst = (char *)kvi_malloc(len+1);
00107                 kvi_fastmove(dst,szFrom,len+1);
00108                 szTo = dst;
00109         } else {
00110                 szTo = szFrom; // we never modify it anyway
00111         }
00112 }
00113 
00117 inline void kvi_hash_key_destroy(const char * &szKey,bool bDeepCopy)
00118 {
00119         if(bDeepCopy)
00120                 kvi_free(szKey);
00121 }

00128         static const char * static_null = NULL;
00129         return static_null;

00135 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const KviStr &szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00136 {
00137         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00138         const char * p = szKey.ptr();
00139         if(bCaseSensitive)
00140         {
00141                 while(*p)
00142                 {
00143                         uResult += *((const unsigned char *)p);
00144                         p++;
00145                 }
00146         } else {
00147                 while(*p)
00148                 {
00149                         uResult += tolower(*((const unsigned char *)p));
00150                         p++;
00151                 }
00152         }
00153         return uResult;
00154 }
00155 
00159 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const KviStr &szKey1,const KviStr &szKey2)
00160 {
00161         return kvi_hash_key_equal(szKey1.ptr(),szKey2.ptr());
00162 }

00270 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(void * pKey,bool)
00271 {
00272         unsigned char * pBytes = (unsigned char *)&(pKey);
00273         unsigned char * pEnd = pBytes + sizeof(void *);
00274         unsigned int uSum = 0;
00275         while(pBytes < pEnd)
00276         {
00277                 uSum += *pBytes;
00278                 pBytes++;
00279         }
00280         return uSum;
00281 }

00318 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const QString &szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00319 {
00320         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00321         const QChar * p = KviQString::nullTerminatedArray(szKey);
00322         if(!p)return 0;
00323         if(bCaseSensitive)
00324         {
00325                 while(p->unicode())
00326                 {
00327                         uResult += p->unicode();
00328                         p++;
00329                 }
00330         } else {
00331                 while(p->unicode())
00332                 {
00333                         uResult += p->toLower().unicode();
00334                         p++;
00335                 }
00336         }
00337         return uResult;
00338 }
00339 
00343 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const QString &szKey1,const QString &szKey2,bool bCaseSensitive)
00344 {
00345         if(bCaseSensitive)
00346                 return KviQString::equalCS(szKey1,szKey2);
00347         return KviQString::equalCI(szKey1,szKey2);
00348 }

00373 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTable;
00374 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableIterator;
00375 
00376 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableEntry
00377 {
00378         friend class KviPointerHashTable<Key,T>;
00379 protected:
00380         T  * pData;
00381         Key  hKey;
00382 public:
00383         Key & key(){ return hKey; };
00384         T * data(){ return pData; };
00385 };
00386 
00426 template<class Key,class T> class KviPointerHashTable
00427 {
00428         friend class KviPointerHashTableIterator<Key,T>;
00429 protected:
00430         KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > ** m_pDataArray;
00431         bool                                                m_bAutoDelete;
00432         unsigned int                                        m_uSize;
00433         unsigned int                                        m_uCount;
00434         bool                                                m_bCaseSensitive;
00435         bool                                                m_bDeepCopyKeys;
00436         unsigned int                                        m_uIteratorIdx;
00437 public:
00446         T * find(const Key & hKey)
00447         {
00448                 m_uIteratorIdx = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00449                 if(!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])return 0;
00450                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next())
00451                 {
00452                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))return (T *)e->pData;
00453                 }
00454                 return 0;
00455         }
00456 
00466         T * operator[](const Key & hKey)
00467         {
00468                 return find(hKey);
00469         }
00470 
00475         unsigned int count() const
00476         {
00477                 return m_uCount;
00478         }
00479 
00484         bool isEmpty() const
00485         {
00486                 return m_uCount == 0;
00487         }
00488 
00499         void insert(const Key & hKey, T * pData)
00500         {
00501                 if(!pData)return;
00502                 unsigned int uEntry = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00503                 if(!m_pDataArray[uEntry])
00504                         m_pDataArray[uEntry] = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(true);
00505                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->next())
00506                 {
00507                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))
00508                         {
00509                                 if(!m_bCaseSensitive)
00510                                 {
00511                                         // must change the key too
00512                                         kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00513                                         kvi_hash_key_copy(hKey,e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00514                                 }
00515                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00516                                         delete e->pData;
00517                                 e->pData = pData;
00518                                 return;
00519                         }
00520                 }
00521                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * n = new KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T>;
00522                 kvi_hash_key_copy(hKey,n->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00523                 n->pData = pData;
00524                 m_pDataArray[uEntry]->append(n);
00525                 m_uCount++;
00526         }
00527 
00539         void replace(const Key & hKey, T * pData)
00540         {
00541                 insert(hKey,pData);
00542         }
00543 
00553         bool remove(const Key & hKey)
00554         {
00555                 unsigned int uEntry = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00556                 if(!m_pDataArray[uEntry])return false;
00557                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->next())
00558                 {
00559                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))
00560                         {
00561                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00562                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00563                                 m_pDataArray[uEntry]->removeRef(e);
00564                                 if(m_pDataArray[uEntry]->isEmpty())
00565                                 {
00566                                         delete m_pDataArray[uEntry];
00567                                         m_pDataArray[uEntry] = 0;
00568                                 }
00569                                 m_uCount--;
00570                                 return true;
00571                         }
00572                 }
00573                 return false;
00574         }
00575 
00585         bool removeRef(const T * pRef)
00586         {
00587                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)
00588                 {
00589                         if(m_pDataArray[i])
00590                         {
00591                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[i]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[i]->next())
00592                                 {
00593                                         if(e->pData == pRef)
00594                                         {
00595                                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00596                                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00597                                                 m_pDataArray[i]->removeRef(e);
00598                                                 if(m_pDataArray[i]->isEmpty())
00599                                                 {
00600                                                         delete m_pDataArray[i];
00601                                                         m_pDataArray[i] = 0;
00602                                                 }
00603                                                 m_uCount--;
00604                                                 return true;
00605                                         }
00606                                 }
00607                         }
00608                 }
00609                 return false;
00610         }
00611 
00619         void clear()
00620         {
00621                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)
00622                 {
00623                         if(m_pDataArray[i])
00624                         {
00625                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[i]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[i]->next())
00626                                 {
00627                                         kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00628                                         if(m_bAutoDelete)
00629                                                 delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00630                                 }
00631                                 KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > * pList = m_pDataArray[i];
00632                                 //delete m_pDataArray[i];
00633                                 m_pDataArray[i] = 0;
00634                                 delete pList;
00635                         }
00636                 }
00637                 m_uCount = 0;
00638         }
00639 
00648         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * findRef(const T * pRef)
00649         {
00650                 for(m_uIteratorIdx = 0;m_uIteratorIdx<m_uSize;m_uIteratorIdx++)
00651                 {
00652                         if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00653                         {
00654                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next())
00655                                 {
00656                                         if(e->pData == pRef)return e;
00657                                 }
00658                         }
00659                 }
00660                 return 0;
00661         }
00662 
00670         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * currentEntry()
00671         {
00672                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00673                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00674                 return 0;
00675         }
00676 
00681         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * firstEntry()
00682         {
00683                 m_uIteratorIdx = 0;
00684                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00685                 {
00686                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00687                 }
00688                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00689                 return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00690         }
00691 
00699         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * nextEntry()
00700         {
00701                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00702 
00703                 if(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize)
00704                 {
00705                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * t = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next();
00706                         if(t)return t;
00707                 }
00708 
00709                 m_uIteratorIdx++;
00710 
00711                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00712                 {
00713                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00714                 }
00715 
00716                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00717 
00718                 return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00719 
00720         }
00721 
00729         T * current()
00730         {
00731                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00732                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00733                 {
00734                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00735                         if(!e)return 0;
00736                         return e->data();
00737                 }
00738                 return 0;
00739         }
00740 
00748         const Key & currentKey()
00749         {
00750                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00751                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00752                 {
00753                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00754                         if(!e)return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00755                         return e->key();
00756                 }
00757                 return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00758         }
00759 
00765         T * first()
00766         {
00767                 m_uIteratorIdx = 0;
00768                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00769                 {
00770                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00771                 }
00772                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00773                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00774                 if(!e)return 0;
00775                 return e->data();
00776         }
00777 
00785         T * next()
00786         {
00787                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00788 
00789                 if(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize)
00790                 {
00791                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * t = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next();
00792                         if(t)
00793                         {
00794                                 return t->data();
00795                         }
00796                 }
00797 
00798                 m_uIteratorIdx++;
00799 
00800                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00801                 {
00802                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00803                 }
00804 
00805                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00806 
00807                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00808                 if(!e)return 0;
00809                 return e->data();
00810         }
00811 
00822         void copyFrom(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00823         {
00824                 clear();
00825                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = t.firstEntry();e;e = t.nextEntry())
00826                         insert(e->key(),e->data());
00827         }
00828 
00836         void insert(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00837         {
00838                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = t.firstEntry();e;e = t.nextEntry())
00839                         insert(e->key(),e->data());
00840         }
00841 
00849         void setAutoDelete(bool bAutoDelete)
00850         {
00851                 m_bAutoDelete = bAutoDelete;
00852         }
00853 
00863         KviPointerHashTable(unsigned int uSize = 32, bool bCaseSensitive = true, bool bDeepCopyKeys = true)
00864         {
00865                 m_uCount = 0;
00866                 m_bCaseSensitive = bCaseSensitive;
00867                 m_bAutoDelete = true;
00868                 m_bDeepCopyKeys = bDeepCopyKeys;
00869                 m_uSize = uSize > 0 ? uSize : 32;
00870                 m_pDataArray = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > *[m_uSize];
00871                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)m_pDataArray[i] = NULL;
00872         }
00873 
00881         KviPointerHashTable(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00882         {
00883                 m_uCount = 0;
00884                 m_bAutoDelete = false;
00885                 m_bCaseSensitive = t.m_bCaseSensitive;
00886                 m_bDeepCopyKeys = t.m_bDeepCopyKeys;
00887                 m_uSize = t.m_uSize;
00888                 m_pDataArray = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > *[m_uSize];
00889                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)m_pDataArray[i] = NULL;
00890                 copyFrom(t);
00891         }
00892 
00898         ~KviPointerHashTable()
00899         {
00900                 clear();
00901                 delete [] m_pDataArray;
00902         }
00903 };
00904 
00909 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableIterator
00910 {
00911 protected:
00912         const KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> * m_pHashTable;
00913         unsigned int                       m_uEntryIndex;
00914         KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > * m_pIterator;
00915 public:
00923         void operator = (const KviPointerHashTableIterator<Key,T> & src)
00924         {
00925                 m_pHashTable = src.m_pHashTable;
00926                 m_uEntryIndex = src.m_uEntryIndex;
00927                 if(src.m_pIterator)
00928                         m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(src.m_pIterator));
00929                 else
00930                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00931         }
00932 
00939         bool moveFirst()
00940         {
00941                 if(m_pIterator)
00942                 {
00943                         delete m_pIterator;
00944                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00945                 }
00946 
00947                 m_uEntryIndex = 0;
00948                 while((m_uEntryIndex < m_pHashTable->m_uSize) && (!(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])))
00949                 {
00950                         m_uEntryIndex++;
00951                 }
00952 
00953                 if(m_uEntryIndex == m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
00954                         return false;
00955 
00956                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
00957                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveFirst();
00958                 if(!bRet)
00959                 {
00960                         delete m_pIterator;
00961                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00962                 }
00963                 return bRet;
00964         }
00965 
00972         bool moveLast()
00973         {
00974                 if(m_pIterator)
00975                 {
00976                         delete m_pIterator;
00977                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00978                 }
00979 
00980                 m_uEntryIndex = m_pHashTable->m_uSize;
00981                 while(m_uEntryIndex > 0)
00982                 {
00983                         m_uEntryIndex--;
00984                         if(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])
00985                         {
00986                                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
00987                                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveLast();
00988                                 if(!bRet)
00989                                 {
00990                                         delete m_pIterator;
00991                                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00992                                 }
00993                                 return bRet;
00994                         }
00995                 }
00996                 return false;
00997         }
00998 
01006         bool moveNext()
01007         {
01008                 if(!m_pIterator)
01009                         return false;
01010                 if(m_pIterator->moveNext())
01011                         return true;
01012                 if(m_pIterator)
01013                 {
01014                         delete m_pIterator;
01015                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01016                 }
01017                 m_uEntryIndex++;
01018                 while((m_uEntryIndex < m_pHashTable->m_uSize) && (!(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])))
01019                 {
01020                         m_uEntryIndex++;
01021                 }
01022                 if(m_uEntryIndex == m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
01023                         return false;
01024                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
01025                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveFirst();
01026                 if(!bRet)
01027                 {
01028                         delete m_pIterator;
01029                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01030                 }
01031                 return bRet;
01032         }
01033 
01042         bool operator ++()
01043         {
01044                 return moveNext();
01045         }
01046 
01055         bool movePrev()
01056         {
01057                 if(!m_pIterator)
01058                         return false;
01059                 if(m_pIterator->movePrev())
01060                         return true;
01061                 if(m_pIterator)
01062                 {
01063                         delete m_pIterator;
01064                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01065                 }
01066                 if(m_uEntryIndex >= m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
01067                         return false;
01068                 while(m_uEntryIndex > 0)
01069                 {
01070                         m_uEntryIndex--;
01071                         if(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])
01072                         {
01073                                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
01074                                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveLast();
01075                                 if(!bRet)
01076                                 {
01077                                         delete m_pIterator;
01078                                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01079                                 }
01080                                 return bRet;
01081                         }
01082                 }
01083                 return false;
01084         }
01085 
01095         bool operator --()
01096         {
01097                 return movePrev();
01098         }
01099 
01107         T * current() const
01108         {
01109                 return m_pIterator ? m_pIterator->current()->data() : NULL;
01110         }
01111 
01119         T * operator *() const
01120         {
01121                 return m_pIterator ? m_pIterator->current()->data() : NULL;
01122         }
01123 
01130         const Key & currentKey() const
01131         {
01132                 if(m_pIterator)
01133                         return m_pIterator->current()->key();
01134                 return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
01135         }
01136 
01143         T * toFirst()
01144         {
01145                 if(!moveFirst())
01146                         return NULL;
01147                 return current();
01148         }
01149 public:
01155         KviPointerHashTableIterator(const KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & hTable)
01156         {
01157                 m_pHashTable = &hTable;
01158                 m_uEntryIndex = 0;
01159                 m_pIterator = NULL;
01160                 moveFirst();
01161         }
01162 
01166         ~KviPointerHashTableIterator()
01167         {
01168                 if(m_pIterator)
01169                         delete m_pIterator;
01170         }
01171 };
